scripts.build: npm run build:vue & npm run build:client & npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: browserify js/client.js -t babelify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production --VUE_ENV client ] -o src/main/resources/static/client.js
scripts.build:server: browserify js/server.js -t babelify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production --VUE_ENV server ] -o src/main/resources/static/server.js && cat src/main/resources/static/event-loop.js src/main/resources/static/nashorn-polyfill.js src/main/resources/static/server.js src/main/resources/static/return-render-function.js > src/main/resources/static/server-bundle.js
